snippet.title: Bonaparte: A Mechanized Revolution announcement trailer  |  Strategy & turn based tactical game
snippet.description:
Bonaparte: A Mechanized Revolution

1789, Paris. Take Napoleon’s place in an alternate history as Céline or César Bonaparte in this ideology driven, turn-based strategy journey. Defend, reform or oppose the monarchy and write your own alternative history by combining cunning political skills and tactical military prowess.
Coming to Steam Early Access in early 2025

Wishlist on Steam:  https://store.steampowered.com/app/2560340/Bonaparte__A_Mechanized_Revolution/
Follow the development on Discord: https://discord.gg/bonapartegame
